question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

Read each statement carefully and answer two questions about that statement. The first question asks how ANXIOUS or FEARFUL you feel in that situation. The second question asks how often you AVOID that situation. Please base your ratings on the way that the situations have affected you in the LAST WEEK.
